display_html: module System.IOManager

data AppType
  • = InitiatorApp
  • | ResponderApp
  • | InitiatorAndResponderApp
name: AppType InitiatorApp ResponderApp InitiatorAndResponderApp

display_html: newtype OuroborosApplication (appType ∷ AppType) bytes m a b = OuroborosApplication [MiniProtocol appType bytes m a b]
name: OuroborosApplication OuroborosApplication

display_html:
data MiniProtocol (appType ∷ AppType) bytes m a b = MiniProtocol {
  • miniProtocolNum ∷ !MiniProtocolNum
  • miniProtocolLimits ∷ !MiniProtocolLimits
  • miniProtocolRun ∷ !(RunMiniProtocol appType bytes m a b)
}
name: MiniProtocol MiniProtocol miniProtocolNum miniProtocolLimits miniProtocolRun

display_html: newtype MiniProtocolNum = MiniProtocolNum Word16
name: MiniProtocolNum MiniProtocolNum

display_html:
data MiniProtocolLimits = MiniProtocolLimits {
  • maximumIngressQueue ∷ !Int64
}
name: MiniProtocolLimits MiniProtocolLimits maximumIngressQueue

display_html:
data RunMiniProtocol (appType ∷ AppType) bytes m a b where
  • InitiatorProtocolOnly ∷ MuxPeer bytes m a → RunMiniProtocol InitiatorApp bytes m a Void
  • ResponderProtocolOnly ∷ MuxPeer bytes m b → RunMiniProtocol ResponderApp bytes m Void b
  • InitiatorAndResponderProtocol ∷ MuxPeer bytes m a → MuxPeer bytes m b → RunMiniProtocol InitiatorAndResponderApp bytes m a b
name: RunMiniProtocol InitiatorProtocolOnly ResponderProtocolOnly InitiatorAndResponderProtocol

display_html:
data MuxPeer bytes m a where
  • MuxPeer ∷ Exception failure ⇒ Tracer m (TraceSendRecv ps) → Codec ps failure m bytes → Peer ps pr st m a → MuxPeer bytes m a
  • MuxPeerPipelined ∷ Exception failure ⇒ Tracer m (TraceSendRecv ps) → Codec ps failure m bytes → PeerPipelined ps pr st m a → MuxPeer bytes m a
  • MuxPeerRaw ∷ (Channel m bytes → m a) → MuxPeer bytes m a
name: MuxPeer MuxPeer MuxPeerPipelined MuxPeerRaw

name: toApplication

}

display_html:
data MuxErrorType
  • = MuxUnknownMiniProtocol
  • | MuxDecodeError
  • | MuxBearerClosed
  • | MuxIngressQueueOverRun
  • | MuxInitiatorOnly
  • | MuxIOException IOException
  • | MuxSDUReadTimeout
  • | MuxSDUWriteTimeout

newtype Versions vNum extra r = Versions {

}

newtype Application r vData = Application {
  • runApplication ∷ vData → vData → r
}
name: Application Application runApplication

display_html:
data Version extra r vData = Version {
  • versionApplication ∷ Application r vData
  • versionExtra ∷ extra vData
}
name: Version Version versionApplication versionExtra

display_html:
data Sigma f where
  • Sigma ∷ !t → !(f t) → Sigma f
name: Sigma Sigma

display_html:
data Accept
  • = Accept
  • | Refuse !Text
name: Accept Accept Refuse

display_html:
class Acceptable v where
  • acceptableVersion ∷ v → v → Accept
name: Acceptable acceptableVersion

display_html:
data Dict constraint thing where
  • Dict ∷ constraint thing ⇒ Dict constraint thing
name: Dict Dict

display_html:
data DictVersion vData where
  • DictVersion ∷ (Typeable vData, Acceptable vData, Show vData) ⇒ CodecCBORTerm Text vData → DictVersion vData
name: DictVersion DictVersion

display_html:
data CodecCBORTerm fail a = CodecCBORTerm {
  • encodeTerm ∷ a → Term
  • decodeTerm ∷ Term → Either fail a
}
name: CodecCBORTerm CodecCBORTerm encodeTerm decodeTerm

display_html: pickVersions ∷ Ord vNum ⇒ (∀ vData. extra vData → Dict Typeable vData) → Versions vNum extra r → Versions vNum extra r → Either (VersionMismatch vNum) (r, r)
name: pickVersions

display_html:
data VersionMismatch vNum where
  • NoCommonVersion ∷ VersionMismatch vNum
  • InconsistentVersion ∷ vNum → VersionMismatch vNum
name: VersionMismatch NoCommonVersion InconsistentVersion

name: simpleSingletonVersions

name: unversionedProtocol

name: foldMapVersions

name: combineVersions

  • StConfirm ∷ Handshake vNumber vParams
  • StDone ∷ Handshake vNumber vParams
name: Handshake StDone StPropose StConfirm

data RefuseReason vNumber
  • = VersionMismatch [vNumber]

  • | Refused vNumber Text

display_html:
data HandshakeClientProtocolError vNumber

data Snocket m fd addr = Snocket {

  • openToConnect ∷ addr → m fd
  • connect ∷ fd → addr → m ()
  • bind ∷ fd → addr → m ()
  • listen ∷ fd → m ()

  • close ∷ fd → m ()
  • toBearer ∷ Tracer m MuxTrace → fd → MuxBearer m
}

data SuspendDecision t
  • = SuspendPeer !t !t
  • | SuspendConsumer !t
  • | Throw
name: SuspendDecision SuspendPeer SuspendConsumer Throw

display_html: suspend ∷ Ord (Async m ()) ⇒ Maybe (PeerState m) → SuspendDecision Time → (Set (Async m ()), Maybe (PeerState m))
name: suspend

display_html:
data PeerState m
  • = HotPeer !(Set (Async m ())) !(Set (Async m ()))
  • | SuspendedConsumer !(Set (Async m ())) !Time
  • | SuspendedPeer !Time !Time
  • | ColdPeer
name: PeerState HotPeer SuspendedConsumer SuspendedPeer ColdPeer

display_html: threadsToCancel ∷ Ord (Async m ()) ⇒ PeerState m → SuspendDecision diffTime → Set (Async m ())

display_html:
data PeerStates m addr where

data CompleteApplicationResult m addr s = CompleteApplicationResult {
  • carState ∷ !s
  • carThreads ∷ Set (Async m ())
  • carTrace ∷ Maybe (WithAddr addr ErrorPolicyTrace)
}
name: CompleteApplicationResult CompleteApplicationResult carState carThreads carTrace

display_html:
data Result addr r where
  • ApplicationResult ∷ !Time → !addr → !r → Result addr r
  • Connected ∷ !Time → !addr → Result addr r
  • ConnectionError ∷ Exception e ⇒ !Time → !addr → !e → Result addr r
  • ApplicationError ∷ Exception e ⇒ !Time → !addr → !e → Result addr r
name: Result Connected ApplicationResult ConnectionError ApplicationError

display_html:
data ErrorPolicyTrace
  • = ErrorPolicySuspendPeer (Maybe (ConnectionOrApplicationExceptionTrace SomeException)) !DiffTime !DiffTime
  • | ErrorPolicySuspendConsumer (Maybe (ConnectionOrApplicationExceptionTrace SomeException)) !DiffTime
  • | ErrorPolicyLocalNodeError (ConnectionOrApplicationExceptionTrace SomeException)
  • | ErrorPolicyResumePeer
  • | ErrorPolicyKeepSuspended
  • | ErrorPolicyResumeConsumer
  • | ErrorPolicyResumeProducer
  • | ErrorPolicyUnhandledApplicationException SomeException
  • | ErrorPolicyUnhandledConnectionException SomeException
  • | ErrorPolicyAcceptException IOException
name: ErrorPolicyTrace ErrorPolicyUnhandledApplicationException ErrorPolicyUnhandledConnectionException ErrorPolicySuspendPeer ErrorPolicySuspendConsumer ErrorPolicyLocalNodeError ErrorPolicyResumePeer ErrorPolicyKeepSuspended ErrorPolicyResumeConsumer ErrorPolicyResumeProducer ErrorPolicyAcceptException

display_html: traceErrorPolicy ∷ Either (ConnectionOrApplicationExceptionTrace SomeException) r → SuspendDecision DiffTime → Maybe ErrorPolicyTrace
